item.title: At a Bonobo’s ‘Tea Party,’ Scientists Find Hints of Imagination
item.description: In a playtime experiment, researchers found that our closest living relatives have the capacity for make-believe, too.

item.title: It’s Time for the Olympics
item.description: The Games are supposed to bring people from around the globe together, but there’s no escaping politics.

item.title: Italy Toughens Protest Laws, Hours Before Planned Rallies at Winter Olympics
item.description: The restrictions could affect people demonstrating this weekend outside Olympic events in northern Italy.
